white: A permit for being totally lame.
Om, nom, nom, eating my friends.
Marrying all 1000 of us and becoming our gnome queen for all eternity.
Leading a siege on a house to get summerween candy.
Mind-controlling your girlfriend with a song you didn't even write.
A gnome in the bathtub bathing in squirrels.
The part where one of us faints.
Trying to eat ice cream but hitting it into the side of your face instead.
Bill's summoning circle hidden behind a cat poster.
My cellmate took my pillow for a wife.
A good reason to punch a teenager in the face.
An entire episode featuring only characters voiced by Alex Hirsch.
Fighting only makes us look more rad.

Give or take an error of 0.4.

Something literally too dumb for me to care about.

Wearing Mabel's sweaters. All of them. At the same time.
Trying to scare twelve year old horror movie fans.
